name: Monster Fly Saga Christmas Edition-Most popular candy or star casual game
name_original: Monster Fly Saga Christmas Edition-Most popular candy or star casual game
description:
A funny festival casual game, Collect energy to help monster fly back to her home.


Monster Buster Saga is a funny Christmas festival casual game.
Celebrate this holiday season with the new Christmas theme and Santa Claus character.The game have a very simple controls, just tap with colorful and fun animation.
Aim the energy coins and shoot it down to collect it.
Collect battery and help the cute monster to fly up.


STORY:
During this Christmas, A monster come to our earth, she was lost in the game. Her aircraft is no power, so you should help her to collect energy from 6 chapter: Village, Prairie, Forest, Iceberg,Desert,Ocean. Collect all the power and the cute monster will fly back home, you can also have a good Christmas.

FEATURE:
- Easy to play but hard to master.
- Beautiful sound effect and wonderful scene.
- Christmas color and Christmas music.
- Cute monster character with the mega jump ability.
- Very addictive gameplay, once you start, you can't put it down.
- 6 Different Chapter scene to collect energy with Christmas color.

Play this game FREE with NO any in-app purchase.
If you love our game, please give us a 5 star, thank you for your appreciation.
